mapper.select: SELECT DE.DEPT_CD, DE.DEPT_NM, D.EMP_ID, E.JBGD_CD, J.JBGD_NM , E.EMP_NM, D.FSRT_WRITING_TM, D.FRST_WRTER_ID, D.DCLZ_YMD, D.WRKOTSD_YN, D.ATTENT_TM, D.LVFFC_TM, D.DCLZ_RSN, D.LAST_UPDT_TM, D.LAST_UPDUSR_ID, D.DEL_YN, D.TOTAL_TM FROM DCLZ D INNER JOIN EMP E ON E.EMP_ID = D.EMP_ID INNER JOIN JOB_GRADE J ON J.JBGD_CD = E.JBGD_CD LEFT JOIN DEPT DE ON DE.DEPT_CD = E.DEPT_CD WHERE D.DEL_YN = 'N' AND D.DCLZ_YMD = #{date} ORDER BY CASE WHEN E.DEPT_CD IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END, E.DEPT_CD, E.JBGD_CD

SELECT DE.DEPT_CD, DE.DEPT_NM, D.EMP_ID, E.JBGD_CD, J.JBGD_NM , E.EMP_NM, D.FSRT_WRITING_TM, D.FRST_WRTER_ID, D.DCLZ_YMD, D.WRKOTSD_YN, D.ATTENT_TM, D.LVFFC_TM, D.DCLZ_RSN, D.LAST_UPDT_TM, D.LAST_UPDUSR_ID, D.DEL_YN, D.TOTAL_TM FROM DCLZ D INNER JOIN EMP E ON E.EMP_ID = D.EMP_ID INNER JOIN JOB_GRADE J ON J.JBGD_CD = E.JBGD_CD LEFT JOIN DEPT DE ON DE.DEPT_CD = E.DEPT_CD WHERE D.DEL_YN = 'N' AND D.DCLZ_YMD BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ORDER BY CASE WHEN E.DEPT_CD IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END, E.DEPT_CD, E.JBGD_CD
